docs.snippet: The guarantee is part of a revised settlement in a contentious lawsuit filed by about 5,000 retired players who accused the league of hiding the dangers of concussions from them....
docs.lead_paragraph: The guarantee is part of a revised settlement in a contentious lawsuit filed by about 5,000 retired players who accused the league of hiding the dangers of concussions from them.
docs.abstract: NFL has made open-ended commitment to pay cash awards to retired players who have dementia and other conditions linked to repeated head hits; guarantee is part of revised settlement in lawsuit filed by about 5,000 retirees who accused the league of hiding dangers of concussions from them.

headline.main: N.F.L. Makes Open-Ended Commitment to Retirees in Concussion Suit
headline.print_headline: N.F.L. Revises Settlement, Making Open-Ended Pledge

docs.snippet: Delia Fischer, a FIFA spokeswoman, announced that Luis Suárez, Uruguay’s striker, will be banned for nine matches after being found guilty of biting the Italy defender Giorgio Chiellini....
docs.lead_paragraph: Delia Fischer, a FIFA spokeswoman, announced that Luis Suárez, Uruguay’s striker, will be banned for nine matches after being found guilty of biting the Italy defender Giorgio Chiellini.

docs.snippet: If the Uruguay player Suárez is found to have bitten Giorgio Chiellini of Italy, he will face his third suspension in four years for biting an opposing player in a game....
docs.lead_paragraph: If the Uruguay player Suárez is found to have bitten Giorgio Chiellini of Italy, he will face his third suspension in four years for biting an opposing player in a game.
docs.abstract: FIFA disciplinary committee is investigating Uruguay striker Luis Suarez for apparently biting opponent in country's World Cup match against Italy; committee has broad authority to consider any evidence, including Suarez's past biting incidents, and determine any punishment.

headline.main: Panel on Suárez Can Weigh Past Incidents as It Decides Punishment
headline.print_headline: Panel on Suárez Can Weigh Past Incidents as It Decides Punishment
